Name: Minecraft Java: PaperMC
Description: Paper is a lightweight, modular, and high-performance server for Minecraft, known for its speed and the ability to dynamically load plugins. It provides a simple way to enhance the Minecraft experience, allowing for extensive customization with a wide variety of compatible plugins and tools. Paper is favored by developers and players for its flexibility and performance, making it a popular choice for Minecraft multiplayer environments.
Author: adenikesalka@gmail.com
